sentences.sContent: From the mightiest lever to the tiniest pinion
sentences.sContent_eng: From the mightiest lever to the tiniest pinion
sentences.sCn: 从最大的杠杆到最小的齿轮

sentences.sContent: This design uses a motor driven pinion, which drives each leg in and out through racks mounted to each.
sentences.sContent_eng: This design uses a motor driven pinion, which drives each leg in and out through racks mounted to each.
sentences.sCn: 这一设计采用马达传动小齿轮，通过机架固定见安装在每个进出机架上。

synos.tran: 绑住，束缚；剪掉鸟翼使不能飞

phrases.pCn: 传动小齿轮；织小齿轮；驱动小齿轮；主动小齿轮
齿轮齿条；齿轮齿条机构

trans.tranOther: a small wheel, with teeth on its outer edge, that fits into a larger wheel and turns it or is turned by it
